Package com.teamone.unitask.meetings

Class MeetingController

java.lang.Object
com.teamone.unitask.meetings.MeetingController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000", maxAge=3600L, allowCredentials="true") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/test") public class MeetingController extends Object
Rest Controller for managing meetings within a project. Supports operations such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting meetings. It is cross-origin enabled for frontend.

  • Method Details

    • getProjectMeetings

      @GetMapping("/meeting/{projectTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Meeting>> getProjectMeetings(@PathVariable String projectTitle)
      Retrieves a list of meetings associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project for which meetings are requested.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing a list of meetings and the HTTP status.

    • createMeeting

      @PostMapping("/meeting/{projectTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Meeting> createMeeting(@PathVariable String projectTitle, @RequestBody Meeting meeting)
      Creates a new meeting and adds it to a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project where the meeting will be added.
      meeting - The meeting object to be created.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the created meeting and the HTTP status.

    • deleteMeeting

      @DeleteMapping("/meeting/{projectTitle}/{meetingId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Meeting> deleteMeeting(@PathVariable String projectTitle, @PathVariable Long meetingId)
      Deletes a specific meeting from a project.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project from which the meeting will be deleted.
      meetingId - The ID of the meeting to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the deleted meeting and the HTTP status.

    • updateMeeting

      @PutMapping("/meeting/{projectTitle}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Meeting> updateMeeting(@PathVariable String projectTitle, @RequestBody Meeting meeting)
      Updates an existing meeting within a project.
      Parameters:
      projectTitle - The title of the project where the meeting is located.
      meeting - The updated meeting information.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing the updated meeting and the HTTP status.
